definition: sinuous/meandering/to take a circuitous route/to toss about/vicissitudes/variant of 婉轉|婉转[wan3 zhuan3]
to revolve/to turn/to circle about/to walk about/classifier for revolutions (per minute etc): revs, rpm/classifier for repeated actions
to turn/to change direction/to transfer/to forward (mail)

sentences.english: "And I, " returns the sky, "your humble touch. "
sentences.chinese: “而我，”天空答道，“倾慕你的谦恭宛转。”

sentences.english: He didn't agree to your opinions, but said so in a roundabout way.
sentences.chinese: 虽然他不同意你的观点，但他表达的很宛转。

sentences.english: Later on, he went to several other places.
sentences.chinese: 不久后，他又宛转了好几个地方。

sentences.english: Infinite passes through many places the tender feelings, were pass over gently and swiftly control low light.
sentences.chinese: 无限宛转的柔情，是掠过手心的一道微弱光线。

sentences.english: River Flows Ramification-around Austin, Zhao spent on the lam all likelihood sleet.
sentences.chinese: 江流宛转绕芳甸，月照花林皆似霰。

sentences.english: Delicate Lou chicken, Wanzhuan colored balls to spend.
sentences.chinese: 玲珑镂鸡子，宛转彩球花。

sentences.english: The birds were singing at the edge of the woods.
sentences.chinese: 鸟儿在树林边宛转地唱歌。

definition: see 一倡三歎|一倡三叹[yi1 chang4 san1 tan4]
modulation (rising and falling pitch)/intonation/a cadence/to rise and fall (of a body floating in water)
lit. as if weeping and complaining (idiom)/fig. mournful (music or singing)
